question: Questions regarding Tawaf-e-Ziyarat & Praying in your hotel in Makkah/Madina.
answer:
QUESTION
1)Is one allowed to do Tawaf-e-Ziyarat after one has done the cutting of his hair, qurbani (sacrifice of the animal), and taking off his Ihraam and wants to take rest that day, and do the Tawaf the next day. 2) Can the females offer their Salaat in their hotel rooms (when in Makkah for Hajj or Umrah), when they hear the Azaan, and not offer it in Haram Paak?
ANSWER


Share:
1. Tawaaf-e-Ziyaarah may be done from the 10th of Dhul-Hijjah till the 12th
of Dhul Hijjah. It is, therefore, permissible to make Tawaaf-e-Ziyaarah the
next day - 11th of Dhul-Hijjah.
2. Females may perform their Salaat in the hotel rooms.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
